metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8563 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Kubernetes clusters using VSphere as a cloud provider, with a logging level set to 4 or above, VSphere cloud credentials will be leaked in the cloud controller manager's log. This affects < v1.19.3.

notes.Note: leosilva> kubernates is in fact a kubernetes installer that calls snap, not the package it self.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
